Class Utility.QuoteCommands

Provides commands for managing and displaying quotes within a guild. I dont know why you would use this when chat triggers exist.

| Edit this page View Source

DelAllQuotes(string)

Deletes all quotes associated with the specified keyword.

Declaration
[Cmd("DelAllQuotes")]
[Aliases("DelAllQuotes")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task DelAllQuotes(string keyword)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string keyword

The keyword whose associated quotes will be deleted.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of deleting quotes.
| Edit this page View Source

ListQuotes(OrderType)

Lists quotes in the guild. Quotes can be ordered by keyword or date added.

Declaration
[Cmd("ListQuotes")]
[Aliases("ListQuotes")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[Priority(1)]
public Task ListQuotes(OrderType order = OrderType.Keyword)
Parameters
Type Name Description
OrderType order

Determines the order in which quotes are listed.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of listing quotes.
| Edit this page View Source

ListQuotes(int, OrderType)

Lists quotes in the guild on a specific page. Quotes can be ordered by keyword or date added.

Declaration
[Cmd("ListQuotes")]
[Aliases("ListQuotes")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[Priority(0)]
public Task ListQuotes(int page = 1, OrderType order = OrderType.Keyword)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int page

The page number of quotes to display.
OrderType order

Determines the order in which quotes are listed.
